Package com.example.flexiMed.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.example.flexiMed.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Service class that handles operations related to user management, including user retrieval, creation, updating, and deletion. Implements UserDetailsService for Spring Security integration.

    • UserService

      public UserService(UserRepository userRepository, @Lazy org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder, FileStorageService fileStorageService)
      Constructor for UserService class.
      Parameters:
      userRepository - the repository used to interact with the user database.
      passwordEncoder - the password encoder used to encode user passwords.
      fileStorageService - the service used for handling user profile image uploads.

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      public List<UserDTO> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDTO objects representing all users in the system.

    • getUserById

      public UserDTO getUserById(UUID id)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user.
      Returns:
      a UserDTO representing the user with the given ID.
      Throws:
      ErrorResponse.NoSuchUserExistsException - if the user is not found.

    • getUserByEmail

      public UserDTO getUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a user by their email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user.
      Returns:
      a UserDTO representing the user with the given email.
      Throws:
      ErrorResponse.NoSuchUserExistsException - if the user is not found.

    • getUserByPhoneNumber

      public Optional<UserDTO> getUserByPhoneNumber(String phoneNumber)
      Retrieves a user by their phone number.
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the user.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing a UserDTO if the user exists with the given phone number.

    • loadUserByUsername

      public UserEntity loadUserByUsername(String email) throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
      Loads a user by their username (email). This method is used by Spring Security during authentication.
      Specified by:
      loadUserByUsername in interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user.
      Returns:
      a UserEntity representing the user.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

    • getUsersByRole

      public List<UserDTO> getUsersByRole(Role role)
      Retrieves a list of users by their role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to filter users by (e.g., ADMIN, USER).
      Returns:
      a list of UserDTO objects representing users with the given role.

    • saveUser

      public UserEntity saveUser(UserEntity user)
      Saves a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the UserEntity object representing the user to be saved.
      Returns:
      the saved UserEntity.
      Throws:
      ErrorResponse.UserAlreadyExistsException - if the user with the given email already exists.

    • updateUserProfile

      @Transactional public UserDTO updateUserProfile(UUID userId, UserDTO updatedUser, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile profileImage)
      Updates a user's profile information and optionally their profile image.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user to be updated.
      updatedUser - the updated user data as a UserDTO.
      profileImage - the new profile image file to be uploaded (optional).
      Returns:
      the updated UserDTO.
      Throws:
      ErrorResponse.NoSuchUserExistsException - if the user is not found.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(UUID id)
      Deletes a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user to be deleted.
      Throws:
      ErrorResponse.NoSuchUserExistsException - if the user is not found.
